document_data.name: Elfhold
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Elfhold''' was an ancient crypt hidden under the [[Wyvernstones of Hullack]] in the [[Hullack Forest]], [[Cormyr]].<ref name=FaP-p174-175>

It was once used as a burial vault by the [[elves]] of [[House Amaratharr]], where their remains were interred in small crypts carved into the walls of the grotto. The legendary [[human]] [[druid]] [[Hullack]] of [[Eldath]], whose name lived on in that of the forest, was also buried here. It was said that Hullack could manifest as a [[ghost]] to those who came peacefully to seek long lost lore.<ref name=FaP-p174-175 />
